mapper.select:
select id, project_id, name, type, show_start_time, show_end_time, available_start_time, available_end_time, point_cost, num, use_flag, use_time, forbid_flag, forbid_time,info, portrait/*create_time, last_update, delete_flag, delete_time*/ from coupon
order by id desc

select c.*,0 clientUseStatus,0 checkStatus from coupon c where c.project_id=#{projectId} and c.delete_flag=false and c.use_flag=true and c.forbid_flag=false and now() between c.show_start_time and c.show_end_time order by c.use_time desc

select c.*,code.code,code.use_status,code.use_time,code.check_flag,code.check_time from coupon_code code join coupon c on code.coupon_id=c.id where code.delete_flag=0 and code.client_id=#{clientId} and code.use_status=1 and code.check_flag=0 and now() between c.show_start_time and c.show_end_time order by code.use_time desc
